title: Resetting problem occurs when trying to change forgotten password
content: Due to some technical problem I formetd my phone but after that when I tried to login into my gmail account password doesn't work so I decided to reset the forgotten password but problem is they asked 8digit code but I formetd my phone then how it's is possible to get that code .I tried another way nothing worked please resolve this issue as soon as possible
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device
